title: Leading brands on Facebook from Indonesia 2017 , by number of fans
yAxis: Number of fans on Facebook in millions
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month Mario Teguh and lowest at Month Liputan6.
Month Mario Teguh has 2.44 times more Number of fans on Facebook in millions than Month Liputan6 which is has the lowest.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in each Month on the y axis.
Month Mario Teguh has the highest Number of fans on Facebook in millions and Liputan6 has the lowest Number of fans on Facebook in millions.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month Mario Teguh and lowest at Month Liputan6.
Month Mario Teguh has 2.44 times more Number of fans on Facebook in millions than Month Liputan6 which is has the lowest.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of fans on Facebook in millions in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of fans on Facebook in millions is appeared to be the highest at Month Mario Teguh and lowest at Month Liputan6.
The highest value at Month Mario Teguh is 2.44x times more than the lowest value at Liputan6.
Number of fans on Facebook in millions at Month Mario Teguh is 19.99 , second place is DRAWING PENCIL at 12.91, and thirdly is Kompas.com at 11.05.
Overall Number of fans on Facebook in millions has decreased over the Months.
The Month Mario Teguh has 1.88 times more Number of fans on Facebook in millions than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 106.49.
